onyomiExamples.meaning: working so hard as to ruin one's body, struggling to the point of crushing oneself
honorable death, death without surrender, honorable defeat, trying but being utterly beaten, being completely rejected when professing one's love

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to break (into pieces), to smash, to crush, to shatter, to grind (into powder), to pound, to shatter (someone's hopes, confidence, etc.), to crush, to frustrate, to simplify, to make easy to understand
